Blog.post: We had a nice afternoon/evening in the boat. We fished for about an hour. I got 5 "makrell" (Don't know what that is in English), and Hege, my wife got 2 "Pale/sei". (Don't know what that is in English either.) Nice and warm weather. A bit rain when we started, but at the end, the sun was shining. About 20 degrees Celcius. We are looking forward to next time already!
I am now posting from my email. If this works fine, it will be much easier to maintain my blog. And to keep it updated with info all the time.
Today, it is warm, sunny, and rain. Well, I live in Bergen, which is known in Norway as the rain-city. Today I will go fishing, and tomorrow I will post the number of fish i fish! :-D

Well. I didn't figure uut the TestSuite yesterday. But I didn't need to either, cause I didn't need to use it yesterday. But I guess I will today, so I'll better get up to speed soon. By the way, is there anyone out there who has a download link to firmware for a Siemens C60 mobile-phone? I have, by an accident deleted mine. :-S Today, I will work some more with SCORM, and JavaScripting.
Today I am trying to figure out how the urlLink JsUnitTestSuite works. At this point i really don't have a clue, but sooner or later I hope to figure it out.

My name is Lars Schlanbusch. I live in Bergen, Norway. I am 26 years old, married, and father of one little girl, and step-father og a boy. I work with the developing og National English tests, at urlLink InterMedia , urlLink University of Bergen . I also work as a webdesigner, in my own firm. ( urlLink Website ) That's all for now..
Today i opened my own blog. I will try to keep it updated. I don't know what to write right now, so I'll get back later!

Yesterday I had my first info-meeting about the study I am going to take. I am this semester starting on a 5 year study which, hopefully, will end in a master-degree in ICT. I am really looking forward to finally getting some education, that is relevant for what I am working with. Wish me luck with my studies!
